analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0xd7ff72b25e791e004a4dbb1dbaba64d0746003d1.sol:
	Contract Alexa has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0xd7ff72b25e791e004a4dbb1dbaba64d0746003d1.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0xd7ff72b25e791e004a4dbb1dbaba64d0746003d1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/18/0xd7ff72b25e791e004a4dbb1dbaba64d0746003d1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0xd7ff72b25e791e004a4dbb1dbaba64d0746003d1.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
